metadata.title: CVE-2018-10890 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in moodle before versions 3.5.1, 3.4.4, 3.3.7, 3.1.13. Itwas possible for the core_course_get_categories web service to returnhidden categories, which should be omitted when fetching course categories.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
